title: dist: Mac OS X 10.8.2 cannot install Go 1.0.3
body:
by **evandrix**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Download file 'go1.0.3.darwin-amd64.pkg' from this website
2. Execute installer.
3. Wait for the yellow ! sign and a message 'Installation failed' to be displayed to
user.

What is the expected output?
Green tick sign and message 'Installation succeeded'

What do you see instead?
yellow ! sign and a message 'Installation failed'

No further diagnostic debug messages are displayed, so I can't troubleshoot the issue.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
gccgo

Which operating system are you using?
Mac OS X 10.8.2

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
none; trying to install go 1.0.3

Please provide any additional information below.
none
Attachments: 1. Screen Shot 2013-01-29 at 12.31.59 AM.png (71983 bytes)
